abstract: Google and General Electric said they would team up on a technology and policy effort aimed at increasing the capacity and versatility of the power grid.
snippet: Google and General Electric said they would team up on a technology and policy effort aimed at increasing the capacity and versatility of the power grid.
lead_paragraph: Google and General Electric said on Wednesday that they would work together on technology and policy initiatives to promote the development of additional capacity in the electricity grid and of “smart grid” technologies to enable plug-in hybrids and to manage energy more efficiently. The companies said their goal was to make renewable energy more accessible and useful.

headline.main: Google and General Electric Team Up on Energy Initiatives

abstract: Google CEO Eric Schmidt said he will move forward with a controversial ad deal with Yahoo, despite questions raised by federal regulators.
snippet: Google CEO Eric Schmidt said he will move forward with a controversial ad deal with Yahoo, despite questions raised by federal regulators.
lead_paragraph: Google’s chief executive, Eric Schmidt, repeated on Wednesday that he planned to introduce an advertising partnership with Yahoo early next month, whether or not regulators have finished reviewing the controversial pact.

headline.main: Google Chief Defends Yahoo Advertising Deal
Google and G.E. Set Energy Initiatives

abstract: “I find it odd that this blog has gone dark during such a momentous period,” writes Greg in a comment posted today on my Google post of late last week.
lead_paragraph: “I find it odd that this blog has gone dark during such a momentous period,” writes Greg in a comment posted today on my Google post of late last week.
